Shivergrot

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Shivergrot

A small farming community surrounded by wooden walls and towers as is common in Oron villages. The village lies within a still cold forest of pine trees, the howling winds and wild animals roaming about add to the eeryness of the place, especially at night when animal noises and strange sounds can be heard in the distance. Within the protective embrace of the walls lives a small group of farmers and retired Oron soldiers. A common practise in Oron military society is to become a hops farmer after retiring. In these villages one can often find huge breweries and cozy taverns.

Shivergrot is hard to reach for strangers to Oron lands and forests, there is a narrow muddy road leading there and one can fall victim to Oron bandits or wild wolves and bears. The town holds few public places of interest besides the brewery and the tavern. In the center lie the farming fields, surrounded by cabins. On the outer sides lie the houses. On the west side is the brewery, on the east the tavern.

In the towers are stationed scouts and patrolmen. Captain Ay√≥ will gladly accept new recruits, as the village is low on military capabality and is often attacked by outsiders, be it raiders or wild animals. Shivergrot is a common target for raiders as the ale produced there is of the highest quality and can be sold for great amounts of money or consumed for the joyous energizing feeling it gives to the consumer.


(An item that can be found specifically in Shivergrot is Shivergrot Ale. When consumed it will heal and replenish mana, also give you a strength boost but reduces charisma temporarily.)
